data.title: Webster University Athletics
data.meta_description:
Mitch Daniels (23) OF  - 2022 (Senior Year)


	Appeared in 41 games and started in nine
	Batted .278 with seven RBI
	2022 SLIAC Lady-Byng Sportsmanship Award

2021
data.text:
2022 (Senior Year)

Appeared in 41 games and started in nine

Batted .278 with seven RBI

2022 SLIAC Lady-Byng Sportsmanship Award

2021 (Junior Year)

Appeared and started in 44 games

Batted .278 with 14 RBI

3rd Team All-SLIAC

2020 (SOPHOMORE): Played in nine games and made eight starts during the COVID-19 shortened 2020 season ... Hit a team-best .385 among starters as he had 26 at-bats and recorded 10 hits, scored five runs and had 3 RBI, including two RBI in one game against Concordia-Chicago (3/10) ... Had three multi-hit games, including two 3-hit games against both Westfield State (3/9) and Concordia-Chicago (3/10) ... Scored at least one run in four games, including scoring two runs against Washington & Jefferson (3/13) ... Drew four walks and was 2-for-3 on stolen bases ... Posted a .385 slugging percentage and a .467 on-base percentage.

2019 (FRESHMAN): Saw action in one varsity game on the season ... Made is only appearance as a pinch hitter against Ohio Northern (3/10) on Webster's Florida Spring Break trip.

HIGH SCHOOL: Lettered for four years in baseball at Columbia High School … Was a three-time All-Conference performer at Columbia … As a senior, hit .336 as he scored 27 runs, had 10 doubles and 26 RBI … During his junior year, he hit .311 with 20 runs, scored, 32 hits, 12 doubles and 13 RBI and was 9-for-9 on stolen bases … Also lettered for four years in football and played basketball as a freshman … Earned All-Conference honors in football three times ... Was a three year member of the school’s Academic Honor Roll … Played club baseball for four years for the St. Louis Gamers ... Played in the CarShield Collegiate League with the Cavemen during the summer of 2020.
